description:
I've been using Linux as my desktop operating system for 16 years now.  And there are things that I absolutely LOVE doing on Linux.  And some things that I absolutely HATE doing on Linux.  Let's discuss...

0:00 Intro
0:37 installing new software (new distros, new DEs, snaps, flatpaks)
2:34 customizing software
3:22 using the terminal/shell
5:01 troubleshooting errors
6:12 compiling software, dealing with dep resolution
8:05 begging companies to port their software to Linux

title: 3 Things I Love Doing, 3 Things I Hate Doing...On Linux
